statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY date_posted DESC
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating = 5
SELECT review_text FROM feedback_reviews WHERE customer_name = 'Alice'
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, rating FROM feedback_reviews ORDER BY rating ASC
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE date_posted < NOW()
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT review_text, date_posted FROM feedback_reviews WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE date_posted BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, rating, date_posted FROM feedback_reviews WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' AND rating < 4 ORDER BY date_posted ASC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, product_id FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM Feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Review WHERE review_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT review_id, review_text, review_date FROM Review ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comment FROM Feedback ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Feedback GROUP BY product_id
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE customer_id = 123 AND product_id = 456
SELECT customer_id, product_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM Feedback GROUP BY customer_id, product_id
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT * FROM ProductReviews ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM ProductReviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM ProductReviews WHERE customer_id = 12345 AND rating < 3 ORDER BY review_id;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM ProductReviews WHERE product_id = 98765 ORDER BY rating DESC, review_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM ServiceFeedback WHERE customer_id = 54321 ORDER BY rating, feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7) AND rating = 5 ORDER BY feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, products.product_name, reviews.rating FROM customers INNER JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, products.product_name, reviews.rating FROM customers INNER JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id WHERE reviews.rating > 3;

SELECT customers.customer_name, products.product_name, reviews.rating, feedback.feedback_text FROM customers INNER JOIN reviews ON customers.customer_id = reviews.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id LEFT JOIN feedback ON reviews.review_id = feedback.review_id ORDER BY reviews.rating DESC, feedback.feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, review_text, rating FROM ProductReviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM ProductCatalog WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, review_text, rating FROM ProductReviews WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM ProductCatalog WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT service_name, feedback_text, rating FROM ServiceFeedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY service_name;
